summary: A simple conversion of nsk13s Ancient Draugr Armor to fit CBBE bodies. BBP, TBBP and BodySlideable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma]This is a conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?]Ancient Draugr Armor[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573/?]nsk13[/url].
For use with CBBE bodies.

[/font][font=Tahoma][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-1-1422082278.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img][size=5]
[size=4][/size][/size][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Requirements [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font]

-[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?] Ancient Draugr Armor - UNP Top Model TBBP[/url]. [/size][font=Tahoma][size=2]Must be installed first. Override with my mod.[/size][/font]
[size=2]- Caliente's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] body meshes.[/size]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]- HDT Heels version requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System[/url].[/size][/font]


[size=4][/size][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Acquisition [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font]

All Ancient Draugr armor pieces, Shield and Axe can be crafted at a forge under the Ebony category.


[size=4][/size][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Credits [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font]

Original UNP mod and all texture work belong to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url].

HDT Boot Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP[/url] by Beazalbob69.
Armor Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52221/?]UNP Top Model Ancient Nord - Draugr Armor[/url] by Chitlin.
Helmet Hair Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii.

[/font][font=Tahoma]Huge thanks to the entire team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - without which this conversion would not have been possible.[/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
[font=Tahoma]This mod is a Nexus exclusive! Please do not upload it anywhere else.[/font][/center]
author: Mitosuke

files.name: Ancient Draugr - CBBE - HDT Heels
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed an issue that caused fingers to appear extended and clip through the palm when unarmed or appear out of place when using magic.
Removed unnecessary refrence bodies from all items in both Main Files and BodySlide files. Only the chest armor remains with a reference.

Removed unnecessary refrence bodies from all items in both Main Files and BodySlide files. Only the chest armor remains with a reference.
